description.value: You easily pull yourself onto ledges. When you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Grab an Edge], you can pull yourself onto that surface and stand. You can use Athletics instead of a Reflex save to Grab an Edge. If you Climb or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Leap] to within 5 feet beneath the top of an edge, you can pull yourself onto the surface and stand as part of that action.
